name: Tarzan: Lord of the Jungle
description: Tarzan's work is never done. The evil hunters have entered the jungle in an attempt to capture animals for their exotic zoos. They will stop at nothing to get what they want. From burning down precious forests land to kidnapping the beautiful Jane! If that wasn't bad enough you have to find a cure for the great ape as well! It's a good thing you're the Lord of the Jungle. Prepare your loincloth and practice your primal screams: The whole Jungle is depending on you!
